Provo.Spencer W. Kimball Tower:
The Spencer W. Kimball Tower, also known as the SWKT  or Kimball Tower, is a 12-story building that houses classrooms and administrative offices on the Brigham Young University campus in Provo, Utah.


== Honorary name ==
The building is named after Spencer Kimball, the twelfth president of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.


== Design ==
Completed in 1981, the building stands at 161 feet 6 inches (49.23 m) as the highest building in Provo, Utah.
